title: Why did Adele lose her voice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Don’t know details, but it’s pretty certain that she sang with too much force and volume and carried too much vocal “weight” up into the higher notes. This is a common singer problem. The thing is, she sounded good and was successful, thus she didn’t take care of her instrument and overused it without understanding how to balance her registers (chest/low/heavy and head/high/light). This is the most important thing in successful, sustainable vocal technique.
